name: coreopsis

any of several plants with lots of attractive yellow flowers, often grown in gardens: Most coreopsis, whether bigleaf or threadleaf, have yellow or gold flowers. We decided to use more drought-tolerant annuals, such as coreopsis, cosmos, and Californian poppies.
